title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Nov 20 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Nov 20 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Biden makes no sense at press conference, so press asks Harris questions. White House press corps screams like children after Pence leaves WH coronavirus briefing. Obama jokes about removing Trump from WH with SEAL team. Never Trumpers are worried Trump won't save the GOP in Georgia Senate runoffs. California liberals flee to Maui to escape Newsom lockdown. Biden says he'll dictate to corporations, asked softballs about Trump at press conference. The COVID-19 vaccine speed and effectiveness is a stunning achievement, that could only happen in America and only because Trump did away with regulations. How unelected regulators came to exist. What America built in the 1930s. Fauci says vaccines are safe. Emotional caller fed up with Republicans who fail to fight for President Trump and now want them to vote to save Republicans in Georgia.                             


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:   

                                      

Rush talks about the caller who ended Hour 1 in tears over lack of support for Trump and Trump voters from elected Republicans. There are more Never Trumpers than the people you see in The Lincoln Project, many elected Republicans are Never Trumpers as well. Thousands of Trump voters went to Washington, got beat up by BLM and Antifa and where was the elected GOP? Dominion executives fail to appear at Pennsylvania hearing. Sidney Powell on the evidence they've collected, frustration that the FBI hasn't done something to stop this kind of fraud. Fireworks between Tucker Carlson and Powell. Dana Perino thinks Dominion can sue the Trump lawyers. Caller thanks Rush for package of goodies from the Rush store.                                   


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


Share Your Stories with us at RushLimbaugh.com. Jenna Ellis explains why the Trump team is not going to try their case and share their evidence with the media, responds to Kristin Fisher of Fox News. Levin's show this weekend will explain how a case like this is made. NFL to have first all-black officiating crew. Jason Whitlock's column on white liberals and the worship of blackness. Rush and the meaning of life. Caller echoes distraught caller from Hour 1.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
